CrawlWiki is growing in size with more than [100 registered users](/Special:Statistics "Special:Statistics"). To track what we are doing, we have created this list of current projects.

## Current Projects

| Project                                     | Goal                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Contributor(s)                                                             | Status                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

Usually these require some simple redirects or imports from the old wiki.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [DC\_Malleus](/User:DC_Malleus "User:DC Malleus")                          | Wanted Pages are under control for the moment - There's a bunch of templates, categories, pages, etc. that I've nominated for deletion - I think most of them are holdovers from the old wiki import. As much as it burns me to say it, there are also a few usual suspects that should be kept for demonstration purposes (unless anyone is more zealous than I am about keeping the Wanted Page cleanÂ :D). Turning my baleful eye to the other categories now. |
| Game Mechanics Pages                        | Creating a more comprehensible and comprehensive collection of pages on fundamental game concepts. Started with [Movement](/Movement "Movement"), now progressing to [Actions](/Actions "Actions"). Ideally, this project will lead to a series of macro-level pages that provide a portal to more detailed pages (e.g. [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") should introduce all the topics, but link to [Spells](/Spells "Spells"), [Spell schools](/Spell_schools "Spell schools"), [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power"), [Spell hunger](/Spell_hunger "Spell hunger"), [Spell success](/Spell_success "Spell success"), [Damage type](/Damage_type "Damage type"), etc.) | Jk, more contributors appreciated.                                         | In progress                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| *Renames*                                   | Change the link of everything that has been renamed: for instance [Special:WhatLinksHere/Dragon armour](/Special:WhatLinksHere/Dragon_armour "Special:WhatLinksHere/Dragon armour") and [Special:WhatLinksHere/Potion of healing](/Special:WhatLinksHere/Potion_of_healing "Special:WhatLinksHere/Potion of healing") -- the pages listed there should have their links changed to [Fire dragon armour](/Fire_dragon_armour "Fire dragon armour") and [Potion of curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing"). This is optional, as there are redirects from the old terms, but it would be nice if the wiki used up-to-date terminology on all pages.                                   | [User:spudwalt](/User:Spudwalt "User:Spudwalt")                            | Finished potions of curing; will take care of dragon armor soon                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| *Updating*                                  | Go through <http://git.develz.org/?p=crawl.git;a=log> (2/14/2012 and earlier) to see what parts of the code have changed and update the wiki accordingly. This can be done even without code-reading skills as the summaries are plain English; make a list of clearly important changes and leave it to code readers to figure out and fill in the specifics.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | vacant                                                                     | not started                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| *[Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")*             | Rewrite [habitat](/Habitat "Habitat") to properly describe the habitats LAND, WATER, AMPHIBIOUS, LAVA, and "fake amphibious".                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [User:Pascal76](/User:Pascal76 "User:Pascal76")                            | Started                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

The scale would be spell power minus MR, with the low bound being -100 (0% success); midpoint -1 (I think?) (50% success); and high bound 100 (100% success). Could just be a table of values in increments of 10, not a graph, though the latter would be fancy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | vacant                                                                     | not started                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

Especially damage figures.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | vacant                                                                     | not started                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

Potentially tricky, since the scripts may need updating from version to version and people don't hang around for years. CrawlWiki is growing in size with more than 100 registered users. To track what we are doing, we have created this list of current projects.

Current Projects

Project Goal Contributor(s) Status
0.14 Update Project See Current_projects/0.14_update_project Active
Weigh in Go to Category:Under Review and give us your thoughts on what should be done. Any input is appreciated! Anyone Done for the moment if the lack of pages is any indication
Unstub-a-dub-dub Add anything you can to any of the pages in Category:Stubs. If you add a lot of stuff, remove {{stub}}. Anyone Ongoing
Missing pages Special:WantedPages, Special:WantedTemplates, Special:WantedFiles, Special:WantedCategories. Usually these require some simple redirects or imports from the old wiki. DC_Malleus Wanted Pages are under control for the moment - There's a bunch of templates, categories, pages, etc. that I've nominated for deletion - I think most of them are holdovers from the old wiki import. As much as it burns me to say it, there are also a few usual suspects that should be kept for demonstration purposes (unless anyone is more zealous than I am about keeping the Wanted Page clean :D). Turning my baleful eye to the other categories now.
Game Mechanics Pages Creating a more comprehensible and comprehensive collection of pages on fundamental game concepts. Started with Movement, now progressing to Actions. Ideally, this project will lead to a series of macro-level pages that provide a portal to more detailed pages (e.g. Spellcasting should introduce all the topics, but link to Spells, Spell schools, spell power, Spell hunger, Spell success, Damage type, etc.) Jk, more contributors appreciated. In progress
Renames Change the link of everything that has been renamed: for instance Special:WhatLinksHere/Dragon armour and Special:WhatLinksHere/Potion of healing -- the pages listed there should have their links changed to Fire dragon armour and Potion of curing. This is optional, as there are redirects from the old terms, but it would be nice if the wiki used up-to-date terminology on all pages.
